question: لَآتِيَنَّهُمْ
answer: surely, I will come to them

question: وَبَشِيرٌ
answer: and a bearer of good tidings

question: لَنُخْرِجَنَّكَ
answer: We will surely drive you out

question: لِتُخْرِجُوا
answer: so that you may drive out

question: خَلَفْتُمُونِي
answer: you have done in my place

question: فَدَلَّاهُمَا
answer: So he made both of them fall

question: وَقَاسَمَهُمَا
answer: And he swore (to) both of them

question: يَنْزَغَنَّكَ
answer: an evil suggestion comes to you

question: أُورِثْتُمُوهَا
answer: you have been made to inherit it
